title: How to choose an ultrasound scanner
description: Key factors when selecting an ultrasound system: clinical needs, probes, image quality, workflow, and service.

content.text: Selecting an ultrasound scanner starts with your clinical scenarios: point-of-care, OB/GYN, cardiology, MSK, or general imaging. Match transducers to use cases, ensure adequate Doppler and image processing, and evaluate ergonomics and workflow.

title: Lab Safety Updates 2025: What Changed and Why It Matters
description: A quick look at 2025 updates to lab safety standards, certification, and training requirements.

content.text: The 2025 updates emphasize practical, risk-based controls and ongoing competence verification. Facilities are encouraged to adopt tiered training modules and refreshers aligned with specific task hazards.
Certification timelines have been clarified for biological safety cabinets and facility ventilation systems, with stronger guidance for documentation and corrective actions.

title: Next-Generation Biosafety Cabinets: 2025 Models Reviewed
description: Energy efficiency, airflow stability, serviceability, and digital monitoring lead the 2025 BSC lineup.

content.text: New BSC models focus on quieter operation, stable inflow/downflow, and quicker certification steps. Several manufacturers now include native sensors for filter life and sash position analytics.
